metadata.title: Rugged Radios BTH-Strap for Offroad UTV Racing Radios Electronics Rugged H42 Behind The Head Headsets
features: Adjustable sizing with hook and loop velcro
Fits David Clark Sigtronics Racing Radios Electronics
Standard on Rugged H42 and H42-ULT headsets
description: Velcro BTH head strap for behind-the-head style headsets. Fits most behind the head headsets were over head strap attaches to ear seal groove. Like Racing Radios, Racing Electronics, David Clark, Sigtronics, and many other brands.
